metadata.Title: CVE-2022-47520 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.0.11. Missing offsetvalidation in drivers/net/wireless/microchip/wilc1000/hif.c in the WILC1000wireless driver can trigger an out-of-bounds read when parsing a RobustSecurity Network (RSN) information element from a Netlink packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47520` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-152-generic - 5.4.0-144.161~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-152-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-144.161~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-152-lowlatency - 5.4.0-144.161~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-152-generic - 5.4.0-144.161~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-152-lowlatency - 5.4.0-144.161~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1104-aws - 5.4.0-1097.105~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1110-azure - 5.4.0-1104.110~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1107-gcp - 5.4.0-1101.110~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1051-ibm - 5.4.0-1045.50~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1103-oracle - 5.4.0-1094.103~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
linux-hwe-5.4 package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-144.161~18.04.1').
